title: mUvAshai koNDa
sahitya:
mUvAshai koNda tirumAl munivar tozhum mukunadanenum perumAL


anupallavi

  dEvendiran iDar tIrkkum sahAyan tiruDit-tiruDi veNNai tinginra


caraNam    pArkkaDal kalakki shrIdEviyai eDuttAn paNam koDutta 
shEDan mEl Erip-paDuttAn pArellAm aLandu mAbali kuDi 
keDuttAn paNbuDan harikEsha nagar tannaiyaDuttAn
